alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:56PM MDT until August 05 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL EL PASO AND NORTHERN PUEBLO COUNTIES... At 353 PM MDT, a confirmed tornado was located 7 miles northeast of Pinon, or 16 miles north of Pueblo Airport, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and softball size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters observed hailstones 4 inches in diameter several miles southeast of the Hanover region. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Hanover. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...4.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
